member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC
member.summary: Describes an output or physical connection between the adapter (video card) and a device.

member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC.DeviceName
member.summary: A string that contains the name of the output device.

member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC.DesktopCoordinates
member.summary: A structure containing the bounds of the output in desktop coordinates. Desktop coordinates depend on the dots per inch (DPI) of the desktop. For info about writing DPI-aware Win32 apps, see High DPI.

member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC.AttachedToDesktop
member.summary: True if the output is attached to the desktop; otherwise, false.

member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC.Rotation
member.summary: A member of the DXGI_MODE_ROTATION enumerated type describing on how an image is rotated by the output.

member.name: DXGI_OUTPUT_DESC.Monitor
member.summary: An HMONITOR handle that represents the display monitor. For more information, see HMONITOR and the Device Context.
